# Deadly Shooting at Brown University Leaves Two Dead, Nine Injured

**Category:** world
**Generated (UTC):** 2025-12-15T05:55:10+00:00
**Published:** Dec 15, 2025
**Publisher:** ABC News

## Summary
Gunmen opened fire inside a lecture hall at Brown University, killing two students and injuring nine others during final exams. A person of interest has been detained amid the ongoing investigation, with security increased at synagogues nationwide. The incident has shocked the campus community.
